channel.title: Bots Fucked
channel.description: As you can see with the new updates almost 70K players don't even play because they are bots. What do you think Jagex will do? Do you think they will ban all the people who aren't playing today because the bots aren't working?

item.title: Bots Fucked
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“Rash, post:49, topic:384543”][quote author=IlikeArrays link=topic=480307.msg3516265#msg3516265 date=1299022108]
Jagex, some of the top JAVA gurus in the world can’t stop a simple bot? Seriously if they wanted to they could destroy any cheating community, why won’t they?
[/quote]

They need them, somewhat[/quote]
So they buy membership for easier 99s and botting for cash

Because if they dont have all those bot accs that wont buy membership, what will happen to their toilet paper?

But yeah, they will probably do some kind of scare once in a while to make us believe that they do care, but really they need botters for money.

Read full topic

item.title: Bots Fucked
item.dc:creator: @k_a_h_leader Aeolian
item.description:
@k_a_h_leader wrote:

Davidi2:

Why don’t they do something like secretly edit the server so that it can accept connections from all clients (bots, the official client, etc) but with like the login protocol changed a bit so that it can tell the difference between the official client (because they would edit the official client as well) and the stolen ones. Then they check all accounts that logged in with non-official clients for suspicious activity, and BAM. Most of the botters are banned.

Bot clients aren’t stolen. They were directly handed to us by the idiocy of Jagex…

Read full topic

item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

Newty:

Don’t let the idiots at powerbot lie to you. They stole passwords, their users scripts stole passwords, and most of the staff members were aware that their were multiple infected scripts. Please don’t ever trust Paris and his posse. I would suggest waiting for moparisthebest to finish his bot, Cherokee.

OOOOOOO

Can i beta test?

And since when was he making a bot? No one told me this!!!

item.title: Bots Fucked
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“Andrew Ferguson, post:28, topic:384543”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=480307.msg3516461#msg3516461 date=1299031003]

I came here looking for robo porn.

lol

@laurent

You guys are still trusting rsbot? Lol apparently you didnt learn, they will KEEP taking accounts until half the 9 year olds using it grow up, realize this is stupid, and get payed bots, THEN a new set of 9 year olds take their place. Its a never ending cycle!!!
[/quote]
You sir are the most dimwitted person on this site. The account stealing was NOT caused by Rsbot but by a server that was infected to install files onto your computer that will steal the passwords off of your Rsbot and send them into their sites. So please stop trying to act smart cause you obviously don’t know anything.[/quote]
No, the fact that most of the account stealing was done off rsbot, and that correct me if im wrong, but stealth bot was implemented into rsbot when it got hacked, and who ever said im trying to act smart? I was just saying that personally i wouldnt trust rsbot after what happened

But thats just what i heard.

Read full topic
